trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the persistence service cannot fulfill a request.
trans-unit.target: Undantag som utlöses när den beständiga tjänsten inte kan slutföra en begäran.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> throws a PersistenceException if it cannot complete a request to commit either a completed scope or the workflow instance state to its database.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>utlöser en PersistenceException om det går inte att slutföra en begäran att utföra en färdigt område eller instanstillstånd arbetsflöde i sin databas.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: If you implement a persistence service by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class or the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> class, you can throw the PersistenceException with an appropriate message to indicate any error condition encountered by your service that prevents it from fulfilling a request made by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: Om du implementerar en beständig tjänst som härleds från den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>klass eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>klass, kan du erhålla PersistenceException med ett meddelande som visar alla fel som påträffats av din tjänst som hindrar den från att uppfylla en begäran genom workflow runtime engine.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class for more information.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"></xref> class by using the specified message.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av den angivna meddelandet.

trans-unit.source: A description of the cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivning av orsaken till undantaget.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and the specified <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av den angivna <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> och den angivna <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: Den här konstruktorn anropas under deserialisering till att fylla Undantagsobjektet som överförs via en dataström.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=108569&clcid=0x409).
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> som innehåller objektdata som serialiserade.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that holds contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>som innehåller detaljerad information om käll- och målservrar.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"></xref> by using the specified message and <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"> </xref> med hjälp av det angivna meddelandet och <xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: A description of the cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivning av orsaken till undantaget.

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"></xref> to be thrown.
